channel.title: Awoken Godz | Brand new eco 317 | double xp starts 5/11 |
channel.description:
[ul]Looking for a brand new rsps? Look no further. I bring you, Awoken Godz! :) ::freefrosties is non-donor ::frosties is donor
Frost Bones ARE Notable fudge The What? Double xp until next-sunday! awakengodz.com Players that donate by 6/3/15 get 150% dpoints and a custom tittle First 3 donators get 200% dpoints
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eBVdB4q.png[/img]
Always looking for suggestions - love input from the players Pictures fixed! [list] [li]Website![/li] [li]Vps Hosted![/li] [li]Players can currently yell![/li] [li]Great eco![/li] [li]Dobule xp week![/li] [li]Amazing staff![/li] [li]Custum Quest...More coming![/li] [li]multiFunPK spots![/li] [li]Amazing point system![/li] [li]Decent amount doors and ladders working!Constantly adding more![/li] [li]Content in forgotten/uncommon places![/li] [li]Tons of commands + always adding more! Atleast 1 new command every day![/li] [li]Npc killcount![/li] [li]IronManMode![/li] [li]Duel arena![/li] [li]Pest control![/li] [li]Warriors guild![/li] [li]Fight caves![/li] [li]Barrows![/li] [li]RFD minigame![/li] [li]Godwars![/li] [li]KBD![/li] [li]Dagganoth![/li] [li]Corp beast![/li] [li]Tormented demons![/li] [li]Points tab![/li] [li]Information tab![/li] [li]Skilling![/li] [li]Donor island[/li] [li]Vote reward per site instead having to vote on all sites![/li] [/list]
Media! [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZYhjPie.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ibaWbWQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/H8JRkMM.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yFjPpNw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gdXRCMV.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QVzDnz4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2Qqm6sK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CRL15c1.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/U6TaU1u.png[/img] [img]http://prntscr.com/77j6om[/img] [img]http://prntscr.com/77j7ai[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/n5FlI9k.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DUKJl8D.png?1[/img]
[b]SPECIAL CHALLANGES![/b] [u]The first player with 24hours play time gets free donor![/u] [u]The first 2 players with 99 in all combat skills gets free donor![/u] [u]The first 2 players with 99 in all skills gets free donor![/u] [u]The first player with 99 in mining, smithing, and crafting, gets 9 free donor points![/u] [u]The first player with 99 in woodcutting, fletching, firemaking, and cooking, gets 9 free donor points![/u] [u]The first player with full bandos gets free donor![/u] [u]The first player with max cash stack gets free donor![/u] [u]The first 5 players with 100k magic logs gets free super donor and vine whip![/u] [u]The first 5 players with 100k rune ore gets free super donor and vine whip![/u] [u]The first player with 28 abbysal whips gets a vine whip![/u] [u]First player with full torva gets a vine whip(if you got torva in a drop party or any other means than killing nex you can not do this challenge)![/u] [u]First player with 2500 npc kills gets a torva set![/u] [u]First player with 5k npc kills gets vine whip![/u] [u]First player with 100m wc xp gets d claws![/u] [u]First player with 200m wc xp gets all 4 god swords![/u] [u]First player with 100m mining xp gets a santa hat![/u] [u]First player with 200m mining xp gets a purple partyhat![/u] [u]First ironman with 99 in all skills gets super donor on the iron account and donor for a non iron account![/u] [u]First ironman with max cash stack gets super donor and a vine whip![/u] [u]First player with 2b total xp gets super donor and pernix[/u] [u]First player with 200m farming xp gets virtus[/u] [u]First player with 200m summoning xp gets full vesta including long[/u] [u]First player with 200m herblore xp gets c rapier and c crossbow[/u] [u]First player with 500k mage logs gets max cash vesta set and torva set[/u] [u]First player with 500k rune ore logs gets max cash vesta set and torva set[/u] [u]First player with 27 mystery boxes gets max cash stack[/u] [u]First player with 1 week total play time gets 500m and custom title[/u] [u]First player to obtain a phoenix egg gets 500m[/u] [u]First player with with lvl 100 woodcutting gets dfs fury vesta set bandos boots[/u]
Drop party at:5 Players online,10 Players online,15 players online, 20 players online, 25 players online, 50 players online.
You can download the client at [url=http://awakengodz.com][/url] Ive put alot of time into the server and this thread. Im currently the only developer, may be looking for one more. Staffs spots are open but no staff hunters. If you keep asking me for staff you [b]will be muted.[/b] My skype is mrbadrsps feel free to message me on there.
New updates: [list type=decimal] [li]??add customs??[/li] [li]Make report button into suggestions button(Suggested by lilsm0k3r)[/li] [li]Zone for max players only[/li] [li]Adding more stuff to dzone and content for donators in general[/li] [li]Adding butler system which can bank items for you, teleport you somewhere,add 45% to your special attack and last but not least give you an extra 5% to your drop rate for that kill[/li] [li]Add a little easter egg[/li] [li]Change dicer yell color from white[/li] [li]New monster that drops vine and other cool items but has a bunch of health[/li] [li]Made ::gdi god donor island and put armour dragons iron steel mithril. put a easier to kill kbd.[/li] [li]Added more drops to pengs and monkeys plus fixed moneys death emote[/li] [li]Added a few commands - ::dcommands ::gdcommands ::slave ::freefrosties[/li] [li]Added strange box gives slave(cost 500m)[/li] [li]Made equipment screen work[/li] [li]added mining and woodcutting spawns. added fishing spawns.added other npcs.[/li] [li]Added wings 7 different colors[/li] [/list][/ul]

item.dc:creator: @mrbad23 mrbad23
item.description:
@mrbad23 wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:18, topic:551239”]I don’t know. From looking at the thread and the pictures, it doesn’t seem unique or different from any similar server I see on the advertisement board. I think you should work on your thread aswell, actually add the pictures to the thread instead of making people click on each one individually.

I don’t think I’ll play this, but I wish you luck anyway.[/quote]

Thanks

[quote=“WarTusk-RSPS, post:19, topic:551239”]Awoken Godz is continuing to release great, fun, and unique updates! Come check it out!

New credit card system released
Server time no more confussion between different timezones
New boss
new zone for max players
Pictures Below:[/quote]

item.source: Awoken Godz | Brand new eco 317 | double xp starts 5/11 |

item.title: Awoken Godz | Brand new eco 317 | double xp starts 5/11 |
item.dc:creator: @mrbad23 mrbad23
item.description:
@mrbad23 wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:16, topic:551239”][quote author=mrbad23 link=topic=670156.msg4481739#msg4481739 date=1430508644]

Nice server enjoying it so far

Glad to hear it![quote author=WarTusk-RSPS link=topic=670156.msg4481730#msg4481730 date=1430499685]
4 more til drop party!? w00t!
[/quote]
3 more now!

SPECIAL CHALLANGES!
The first player to logon gets free donor!
The first player with 24hours play time gets free donor!
The first 2 1 players with 99 in all combat skills gets free donor!
The first 5 4 3 players with 99 in all skills gets free donor!
The first player with 99 in mining, smithing, and crafting, gets free donor!
The first player with 99 in woodcutting, fletching, firemaking, and cooking, gets free donor!
The first player with full bandos gets free donor!
The first player with max cash stack gets free donor!
The first 5 players with 100k magic logs gets free super donor and vine whip!
The first 5 players with 100k rune ore gets free super donor and vine whip!
The first player with 28 abbysal whips gets a vine whip!
First player with full torva gets a vine whip(if you got torva in a drop party or any other means than killing nex you can not do this challenge)!
First player with 2500 npc kills gets a torva set!
First player with 5k npc kills gets vine whip!
First player with 100m wc xp gets d claws!
First player with 200m wc xp gets all 4 god swords!
First player with 100m mining xp gets a santa hat!
First player with 200m mining xp gets a purple partyhat!
First ironman with 99 in all skills gets super donor on the iron account and donor for a non iron account!
First ironman with max cash stack gets super donor and a vine whip!

That’s a good way to advertise haha, don’t think I’ve ever seen that before either.
EDIT: Logged on and armour + weapons store wasn’t working…
EDIT2: Horrible, needs a lot of reworking.

The shops didnt work for about 3 minutes bc I was fixing the donor store.
I never said it was perfect did I? It still needs alot of work as do most rsps’s.
[/quote]
I didn’t say you said it was perfect. Also, when you logout, the logout button says your HP instead of “click here to logout”[/quote]
Well I would still disagree with it being “Horrible”

Read full topic

item.title: Awoken Godz | Brand new eco 317 | double xp starts 5/11 |
item.dc:creator: @mrbad23 mrbad23
item.description:
@mrbad23 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:551239”]mrbad is actually a good owner compared to most I’ve seen.

He listens to users as much as possible, even when they’re just trolling or joking. The server can use some work in places, but that’s how most are these days.

To be honest, I’d say to check it out just because everyone on it isn’t a bunch of asshats.

Also, I heard from a little birdy that there may be some unique content being added sometime soon.[/quote]

Thanks! You are a great player! Glad you came to my rsps! Btw gratz on 24hours of playing

[quote=“Mr.Draconian, post:8, topic:551239”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670156.msg4481495#msg4481495 date=1430336424]
Also, I heard from a little birdy that there may be some unique content being added sometime soon.
[/quote]

Lmao

I’m gonna check it out soon.[/quote]

If you like make sure to give a comment here also dont forget to vote in the poll!
